sen.j: この『縮屋新助』を下敷きにして、明治時代に新七の門弟・河竹新七が登場人物やあらすじがほぼ同じの『籠釣瓶花街酔醒』（籠釣瓶）を市川左團次 (初代)に書いているが、『籠釣瓶』は構成や内容の成熟度で『縮屋新助』に甚だしく劣る。
sen.e: Based on "Chizimiya Shinsuke," Shinshichi KAWATAKE, a disciple of Shinshichi, wrote for Sadanji ICHIKAWA (the first) in the Meiji period "Kago Tsurube Satono Eizame" (Basket bucket in red-light district) (Basket bucket), whose story and characters were almost the same as those of "Chizimiya Shinsuke," but "Basket bucket" was vastly inferior to "Chizimiya Shinsuke" in its story structure and the maturity level of the contents.

sen.e: However, while "Basket bucket" is popular even today because having been performed by excellent actors, "Chizimiya Shinsuke" effectively remains a 'buried masterpiece' because not having been performed by any outstandingt actors other than Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the first) and Hakuo MATSUMOTO the first).
